text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali v Allakha, Yego Pisaniya i Yego poslannikov i kotoryye povinuyutsya Yego Istine! Vino (vso, chto p'yanit i otravlyayet um), maysir (azartnyye igry), kamni dlya prinosheniya zhertv idolam i strely dlya gadaniya, i gadaniye na kamnyakh i kartakh - vso eto - merzost' iz deyaniy shaytana. Vozderzhivaytes' ot etikh durnykh deyaniy, chtoby obresti schast'ye v blizhayshey zhizni i blazhenstvo raya v budushchey zhizni
